title: Piano & a Microphone Tour
text:
The Piano & a Microphone Tour was the final <a href="concert%20tour">concert tour</a> by American recording artist <a href="Prince%20%28musician%29">Prince</a>. In a December 2015 interview in anticipation of the tour, he said that "I’m doing it to challenge myself, I won’t know what songs I’m going to do when I go on stage. I won’t have to, because I won’t have a band". It was ultimately Prince's final tour due to his sudden death from a <a href="fentanyl">fentanyl</a> overdose on April 21, 2016, one week after the last tour date.
Set list.
A set from Melbourne in follows:
Early Show
Encore
Late Show
Encore
Shows.
Prince was also scheduled to perform in the UK, including the <a href="Theatre%20Royal%20Drury%20Lane">Theatre Royal Drury Lane</a> in <a href="London">London</a>, <a href="Glasgow">Glasgow</a> and <a href="Birmingham">Birmingham</a>, however these were cancelled due to ticket touts and the Paris attacks.
